评论详情: I've wanted a white eyelet dress forEVER - but the dress doesn't fit me the way it fits the models. I wanted the waistline in the pictures, but since I'm a bustier gal, the waistline was higher up in a way I didn't find flattering. Material was GREAT though. Love this brand.
Good quality and cut
Fits like it should. Very comfortable and love the pockets!

I really like the dress when I saw the picture & ordered the dress!! Unfortunately, it was not what I hoped for. The top part is made for small breasted women. This was not advertised. The bottom skirt fit but the top, was way toooooo tight fitting. It was very disappointing to send it back.
Purchased for family photos. I’ve received so many compliments at church and the office. Paired it with a wide belt.
I bought this white dress for a cruise we are taking April. This will be my Easter dress. I’ve tried it on several times. It fits my petite but round frame making me feel pretty.

Comfortable dress, great style. Made well. Soft material, that’s not thin or too heavy, that washes and wears well. But I wanted a white dress, and it’s more of an off white. It’s very noticeable when standing next to someone that is wearing a true white dress. I would give it 5 stars ⭐️ if it was a true white color

I ordered a size S in Haze Blue and the dress both looks and fits exactly as pictured. My measurements are:  Height: 5'4" Weight: 114 lbs Waist: 28 in Bust: 32 in Hip: 35 in  The length of the skirt hits right at mid-calf and the waist hits at my natural waist, around where my navel is. Skirt flares out and is slightly gathered, providing a flattering shape. The top is soft and has some stretch to it. Arm holes do not gape and are the right size. The eyelet skirt did not have many loose threads and is very pretty. There's a lightweight underskirt layer beneath the eyelet (same color) that is also gathered and doesn't impede movement. The dress is both comfy and classy, great for a warm day out.
I loved this dress cool, didn't need to iron, fits perfectly. Great item

评论概述: Extra pear emphasis if you are pear shaped
评论详情: I am 5'4" and about 140lbs. I got a small and it fit fine. However, I am pear shaped. The color pink and the bottom material was great, but the dress is short wasted and made the bottom part appear extra full. Definitely made me look more bottom heavy. This would be great for someone bigger on top to create an hour glass figure, or someone who is more evenly proportioned than me. It was not flattering for me, I wanted to love it, but returned it.

This dress looked so pretty online and seemed highly recommended but in person it seemed to fall flat.  It didn't fit my small frame right and made me look bigger.  The material seemed stiff and unmoving though the color was beautiful.  Unfortunately, a miss for me.

Also, the royal blue of the top does not match the blue eyelet fabric of the skirt. I will wear it, but only for short periods of time. I had hoped to love this dress.
The dress is perfect for my needs. Purchased it for an outdoor garden party. Great fit and flattering shape. Cool and breezy.  I'd buy it again in a different color.

I’m 5’2 and this is a great medium length (mid shin). The top part of the dress fits tight but in a good way, and it’s very comfortable material. The bottom half is gorgeous and has a nice flow. The fact that this dress has pockets would make it have six stars if I could. Bought it in two colors!

It looked better in the picture than i did in person.  I returned it.

I hover between either small or medium sizes. I'm 5'2" tall, 33" x 31" x 39". I ordered this dress in a Small.  Loved the color of the dress. Loved the scallop edge and the eyelet skirt.  However the top, even with though it was a bit stretchy was uncomfortably too tight for me.  I had washed it gentle cycle cold water.  I couldn't figure out what the drying instructions indicated... a box with a straight line in it. Even Google couldn't help me. So I took a chance and set the dryer for 10 minutes on the lowest heat setting.  Was that why the top was so tight? Also the skirt part of the dress was too long for my taste.  I asked our local very talented seamstress to shorten the dress.  I didn't want to lose the scalloped edge.  So I wanted to shorten the dress at the waist.  The seamstress, who used to work with a shirring machine in a clothes factory refused to separate the top and bottom pieces of the dress.  She said by cutting the shirring away to shorten the dress the new shirring edge would never fit properly again. So I bought a medium. case closed.
Very flattering and comfy.
I loved the look of this dress, but the top knit part was too tight.  The neckline was a little high, so it felt confining. I had to return it.  I ordered a Med, the size I typically wear.
